comments.author: Lyckster.9245
comments.body:
Hey

I’ve been thinking about making an interactive 3d map for Guild Wars 2.

http://gw2cartographers.com/ is fairly good

But I’d love to give it a go at a 3d map sorta like Skyrim did it in game. (of the individual areas)

Now my main problem is that I can’t figure out how to get a hold of the a heightmap of any kind….

Does anyone know anything about this?
